statements: SELECT event_name, event_date, attendance FROM events;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE attendance > 100;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE venue_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, venue_capacity FROM events WHERE venue_id = 2 AND event_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_name, attendance, venue_capacity FROM events WHERE attendance < venue_capacity;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE attendance > 1000 ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY venue_capacity DESC, event_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT venue_id, COUNT(*) AS Total_Events FROM events GROUP BY venue_id HAVING Total_Events > 3 ORDER BY Total_Events DESC
SELECT event_name, attendance, (attendance * 100 / venue_capacity) AS attendance_percentage FROM events WHERE venue_capacity > 0 ORDER BY attendance_percentage DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT DISTINCT venue_id, COUNT(*) AS Total_Events, AVG(attendance) AS Average_Attendance FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-08-01' GROUP BY venue_id HAVING Total_Events > 1 ORDER BY Average_Attendance DESC
SELECT event_name, event_date, attendance_count FROM events;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE venue_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, venue_id FROM events WHERE event_date = '2022-07-15';
SELECT venue_name, max_capacity FROM venues;
SELECT event_name, attendance_count FROM events WHERE event_date < '2022-07-15';
SELECT * FROM events WHERE attendance_count > 100 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, venue_name FROM events JOIN venues ON events.venue_id = venues.venue_id WHERE events.event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, attendance_count FROM events WHERE venue_id = 3 AND attendance_count < 50;
SELECT event_name, MAX(attendance_count) AS max_attendance FROM events GROUP BY event_name HAVING MAX(attendance_count) > 150;
SELECT event_name, event_date, venue_name, max_capacity FROM events JOIN venues ON events.venue_id = venues.venue_id WHERE venue_id = 1 ORDER BY event_date ASC, attendance_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, venue_id, event_date FROM events WHERE attendance > 100;
SELECT attendee_name, event_id, check_in_time FROM attendance_records ORDER BY check_in_time DESC;
SELECT venue_name, capacity FROM venues WHERE capacity >= 500 ORDER BY venue_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, attendance FROM events WHERE venue_id = 3 AND event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE attendance > 100 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT venue_name, capacity FROM venues WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT event_name, attendance, venue_name FROM events JOIN venues ON events.venue_id = venues.venue_id WHERE attendance IS NOT NULL ORDER BY attendance DESC;
SELECT event_name, check_in_time FROM events JOIN attendance_records ON events.event_id = attendance_records.event_id WHERE check_in_time IS NOT NULL ORDER BY event_name ASC;

SELECT event_id, event_name, attendance_records.attendee_name FROM events LEFT JOIN attendance_records ON events.event_id = attendance_records.event_id WHERE attendance_records.attendee_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY event_id;
SELECT * FROM event_attendance;
SELECT event_id, attendance_status FROM event_attendance;
SELECT venue_name, max_capacity FROM venue_capacity;
SELECT event_id, venue_id, event_date FROM event_venue;
SELECT event_id, venue_id, attendance_count, peak_time FROM past_attendance_patterns;
SELECT * FROM event_attendance ORDER BY event_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_id, attendance_status FROM event_attendance WHERE attendance_status='Present';
SELECT event_id, venue_id, event_date FROM event_venue WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, venue_id, attendance_count FROM past_attendance_patterns ORDER BY attendance_count DESC, peak_time ASC;
SELECT venue_id, max_capacity FROM venue_capacity WHERE max_capacity > 100;
SELECT * FROM Events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events;
SELECT venue_id, capacity FROM Venues;
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM Attendees;
SELECT event_id, attendance_count FROM Events;
SELECT * FROM Events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC, attendance_count ASC;

SELECT event_name, venue_name, attendance_count FROM Events JOIN Venues ON Events.venue_id = Venues.venue_id WHERE Events.event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY venue_name ASC, attendance_count DESC;
SELECT event_name, COUNT(attendee_id) AS total_attendees FROM Events JOIN Event_Attendees ON Events.event_id = Event_Attendees.event_id GROUP BY Events.event_id ORDER BY total_attendees DESC;
SELECT venue_name, COUNT(event_id) AS total_events FROM Venues JOIN Venue_Events ON Venues.venue_id = Venue_Events.venue_id GROUP BY Venues.venue_id HAVING total_events >= 3;

SELECT Events.event_name, Attendees.attendee_name FROM Events JOIN Event_Attendees ON Events.event_id = Event_Attendees.event_id JOIN Attendees ON Event_Attendees.attendee_id = Attendees.attendee_id WHERE Events.event_date = '2022-09-15';
